CustomField.formula: IF(OR(Last_Call_Attempt_Status__c == 'Visit Proposed', Last_Call_Attempt_Status__c == 'Visit Confirmed', Last_Call_Attempt_Status__c == 'Meeting Fixed', Last_Call_Attempt_Status__c == 'Home Presentation', Last_Call_Attempt_Status__c == 'Office Presentation', Last_Call_Attempt_Status__c == 'Tele-Meeting Fixed') , 'YES', 'NO')
CustomField.label: is Opportunity
